topic: How much money does a Mexican drug cartel make
title: Cartels Make More Than Netflix ðŸ’°
narration: The Jalisco cartel made over twenty billion dollars a year. That's more than Netflix. Their boss El Mencho had a fifty million dollar bounty on his head. He was just killed two days ago. Mexico's deadliest cartel is now a headless empire. And the fight for control has already begun.
videoPrompt: Scene 1: Aerial shot of a bustling city skyline at dusk, suggesting wealth. Scene 2: Close-up of stacks of cash being counted rapidly. Scene 3: Dramatic transition to a busy border crossing with cars. Scene 4: Wide shot of a luxurious mansion surrounded by security. End with 'Photorealistic' and a dark, gritty color palette.
